duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage regional projects and innovation initiatives to ensure consistent usage across all regions.
Coordinate implementation and training efforts to improve the quality of processes and the end-to-end customer experience.
Develop and report performance results in relation to Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and Objectives and Key Results (OKRs).
Collaborate with district-based teams to deliver corporate objectives of Ease, Speed, and Predictability (ESP).
Track action items, create reports, and engage cross-functional teams for process improvement and KPI attainment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience required. Master of Business Administration preferred.
